method.text: Heat the oil in a large pan. Add the onion and garlic. Cook for 3 min until softened. Stir the 5-spice into the pan with the pork. Fry for 5-8 min until meat has browned lightly.

Add the tomatoes to the pan with the tomato puree, stock, courgettes, mushrooms and seasoning to taste. Bring to the boil then simmer for 35-40 min until tender, stirring occasionally. Serve immediately.
